text: The 2003 ICC Cricket World Cup was the eighth edition of the tournament. It was the first World Cup held in Africa, co-hosted by South Africa, Zimbabwe and Kenya. Australia won the tournament for the third time, defeating India in the final. ==Other websites== *Cricket World Cup 2003 at BBC Sport *Cricket World Cup 2003 at ESPN Cricinfo *Cricket World Cup 2003 at Guardian.co.uk Sport Category:Cricket World Cup
title: 2003 Cricket World Cup
